DialogueTree.DisplayName: Guardian of Tsurumaru-jō Dialogue
DialogueTree.Description: Dialogue tree for Guardian of Tsurumaru-jō

Node.Text: [AI: Boss accepts challenge with intimidating response]
So, you wish to challenge me? Very well! I, Guardian of Tsurumaru-jō, guardian of Tsurumaru-jō, accept!
You've drawn first blood... Impressive! But this battle has only just begun!
Enough holding back! WITNESS MY TRUE POWER! I will defend Tsurumaru-jō with everything I have!
You're stronger than I thought... I must be more careful now!
*breathing heavily* I'm nearly finished... Will you show mercy, or end this?
[AI: Guardian of Tsurumaru-jō expresses gratitude/confusion at being spared, yields and offers weapon/gold]
[AI: Guardian of Tsurumaru-jō accepts fate with honor, makes desperate final attack]
You have... bested me... Tsurumaru-jō... is yours... You've earned it...
[AI: Boss protecting Tsurumaru-jō. Theme: Challenge, guardian, test of strength]
[AI: Guardian of Tsurumaru-jō responds warmly, mentions nearby locations: Tsurumarujō1, TerukuniDaimyōjinshaSpoke2Ring1]
[AI: Guardian of Tsurumaru-jō provides lore about Tsurumaru-jō]
[AI: Farewell message]
